name: Impurrishable Night
description:
Summary

Reimu has come across her inevitable demise. Suspected cause of death: aggressive poverty. Thankfully, she transmigrates her spirit into a nearby cat, and together they attempt to revive Reimu from the dead.

Also, Marisa may or may not be helping. 

This game features an online co-op mode, feel free to play with a friend!

Credits

Created in 72 Hours for the Touhou Game Jam 3

David "Texel" Jones - Concept, Design, Code, Environment, Props
Jose "LadyEbony" Garcia - Code, Networking, Interface, AI

Egophiliac (Egophiliac.tumblr.com) - Character / 2D Art
DiveButt (@Divebuttdrg) - Music / Sound
